EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: How to use customer data to BUILD trust
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> What do you know about {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}}’s customers {{lead.First Name:default=}}?
You know they’re facing new financial crunches, budget controls and new loans, perhaps.
But are they also managing a ton of online purchases? Wrangling returns?
Stressing over a tax season like no other?
As a financial institution you’ve got all kinds of data you can use to understand your customers’ spending habits, their likely next steps, what they need - and how you can fill those needs.
Listen in on NCR and Sensibill’s on-demand webinar <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking/navigating-the-new-digital-landscape]]> so you can learn how to create powerful, data-driven experiences that built trust and loyalty. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you know?
You can get free marketing campaign toolkits, customizable campaigns, videos, research reports and more to help {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}} differentiate with digital. Start here. <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/2020/digital-transformation]]>
